Shadowcaster couldn't believe how childish everyone
was acting- even beginning to wonder just how Primus
could have been so patient with his children when they
clearly needed to grow up. He grabs Kitkat with
lightning speed in him hand (he's the size of Optimal
Optimus) and stares her down, making it clear that
enough is enough.

"I SAID THAT'S ENOUGH! UNICRON IS ABOUT TO COMMIT
MASSIVE TEMPORAL BUTCHERING IN THIS TIME AND YOU'RE
BUSY PURSUING CHILDISH GRUDGES! I WONT SAY STAND DOWN
AGAIN!!!"

The look in his eyes said to drop it if she valued her
functionality.

 --- shadowess_azogoth <shadowess_azogoth@...>
wrote: 
---------------------------------
KitKat::

SHe looked at Kup and let her memory chip remind her
where she had 
met this bot before. He knew her but she couldn't
remember why. Yet 
he seemed familiar to her somehow. "Listen, first off,
I wasn't in 
your territory. Second, maximals and preds would never
have an 
allience. Third, if you do have such an allience, then
you'd release 
me instead of just thinking about lettimg me go. And
another thing..."
She transformed into bot mode. Her sleek and matt
black finish was 
flawless. Her form was near perfect. Her wolf tail was
still behind 
her, swishing and wagging as she stood up with her
elegent hands on 
her well formed hips. She looked at Kup, "And another
thing, why save 
me if I'm a pred and your a maximal? Even if we have
an allience, we 
are still and will always be eternal enemies. So
fixing me up does't 
make sence."  She thought about it some more. "Unless
we have a 
common enemy that is so great we need every bot we
have."
